sx.blah.discord.util

Class RequestBuffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • sx.blah.discord.util.RequestBuffer

  • public class RequestBuffer
extends Object
    This is utility class intended to help with dealing with RateLimitExceptions by queueing rate-limited operations until they can be sent.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  RequestBuffer.IRequest<T>
      This is used to model the request, NOTE: it IS a functional interface so you are encouraged to use lambdas!
      static interface  RequestBuffer.IVoidRequest
      This is used to model a request which returns nothing, NOTE: it IS a functional interface so you are encouraged to use lambdas!
      static class  RequestBuffer.RequestFuture<T>
      This represents a future request which may or may not have been executed at the time of construction.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RequestBuffer() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static int getIncompleteRequestCount()
      This returns the number of incomplete requests.
      static int killAllRequests()
      This kills all currently queued requests.
      static <T> RequestBuffer.RequestFuture<T> request(RequestBuffer.IRequest<T> request)
      Here it is, the magical method that does it all.
      static void request(RequestBuffer.IVoidRequest request)
      This is a version of request(IRequest) without a return value.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        public RequestBuffer()

    • Method Detail

      • request

        public static <T> RequestBuffer.RequestFuture<T> request(RequestBuffer.IRequest<T> request)
        Here it is, the magical method that does it all.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The expected object to be returned.
        Parameters:
        request - The request to be carried out.
        Returns:
        The future value, the future will have a value after the request has been successfully executed.

      • request

        public static void request(RequestBuffer.IVoidRequest request)
        This is a version of request(IRequest) without a return value. No functional difference, only more continence.
        Parameters:
        request - The request to be carried out.

      • getIncompleteRequestCount

        public static int getIncompleteRequestCount()
        This returns the number of incomplete requests.
        Returns:
        The number of incomplete requests.

      • killAllRequests

        public static int killAllRequests()
        This kills all currently queued requests.
        Returns:
        The number of requests killed.
